lender.name: Aunnie
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of microfinance and other social businesses to change lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help social enterprises raise capital to scale their businesses and impact more people at the base of the pyramid.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: It's one way I can help change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help families buy and sell their homes.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: As a former single Parent times were tough for me. But God Blessed me! I like giving to someone that does not have the opportunity to get help as easy as I did as an American. I also feel like these people love there country and I want them to thrive in there villages and as they do they will also help there own economy.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I still sacrifice everyday so I can stay home and help raise my Grandchildren while there Parents work to better there lives.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I know what a helping hand can do to change the life of generations. I believe that when given the tools, people will thrive with dignity, self respect and pride. We all deserve this much.
lender.occupational_info: I am a portrait art photographer specializing in newborns, pregnancy, families and intimates. I am inspired to portray the strength of woman in different stages of life in non-traditional portrait art.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I can. Live simply so that others may simply live.
lender.occupational_info: teacher

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I believe in opening opportunities to others this is one way to assist those striving to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a retired school teacher, but continue volunteer work with troubled youth in Utah. I like travelling, reading, quiltting, cooking and playing the piano.

lender.name: KAY
lender.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune and as a business owner, I know how far a dollar can go in a startup.

lender.name: Zack
lender.loan_because: I think it's important to give back.
lender.occupational_info: Manufacture natural herbal supplements.

lender.name: Rosemarie
lender.loan_because: I care and micro finance is wonderful!

lender.name: Kristy
lender.loan_because: It's neat to help on individual basis, and for only $25 how can you not help out?

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I want to see Happy Faces
lender.occupational_info: I am an Investor in Venture that are of my Own and Others.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of supporting people whose success brings a better life to their families and to others in their local community. When you are blessed to live in a country with abundant opportunity, it feels good to connect your own resources with individuals all over the world that have their own hopes and dreams for which they are willing to work hard to achieve. Kiva empowers indiviuals to help individuals in a new and powerful way.
lender.occupational_info: My work has generally focused around designing instructional or educational materials, but it is also about improving communications in general. These days I am involved more in freelance writing, and I am semi-retired.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I became involved because I've lived a blessed life with very few hurdles or obstacles to overcome and wish to make life easier for someone less fortunate. It's my way of thanking the universe and sharing my modest pot of gold with a person who is trying to make a better life.
lender.occupational_info: Retired from teaching after 30 years and now exploring a career as a photographer.

lender.name: Franki
lender.loan_because: It's all about helping people help themselves. These folks don't want or need a handout. They need a chance. I've been given many chances by many different people who believed in me. Who doesn't deserve that?
lender.occupational_info: As a hospice nurse I take care of terminally ill people, allowing them to die at home with dignity surounded by family and friends.

lender.name: NANCY
lender.loan_because:
I like helping people help themselves. Loaning through KIVA is a great investment and pleasure. GIVING TO KIVA IS ADDICTIVE !!!!\
Check out www.Kivashoppingclub.com
lender.occupational_info: I taught children who were 12-17 years old,but had the mental age of a 2 to 6 year old. I work with foreign students,their wives and children and love it. I am also traveling several times a year. I would like to hear from you Kiva people must be nice.

lender.name: Adrian
lender.loan_because: It 's fun to help other succeed ! It also makes me proud.

lender.name: Arlen
lender.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves

lender.name: Butch & Dawg
lender.loan_because: It helps us put life in perspective. We are so lucky to have the opportunities and the lifestyle we enjoy everyday, when you see how little it takes to change someone's life, you never take what you have for granted.
lender.occupational_info: raising capital from institutions (banks, insurance companies, pension funds) for our asset backed lending strategy.

lender.name: Dennis & Peggy
lender.loan_because: We have so much to be thankful for that we just want to help others to attain their goals.

lender.name: Demi
lender.loan_because: These are the kind of people I want to help; those who are trying to improve their lives by doing it themselves, and not expecting others to do it for them.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I believe my generation can end extreme poverty. This is one way to start.

lender.name: Mary & Ed
lender.loan_because: We are very blessed and would like to help others in a more direct way.
lender.occupational_info: We both used to work in the financial industry.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for the opportunity to share.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: "Give a man a fish and he'll eat for a day. Teach a man to fish and he'll eat for a lifetime"~Confucius

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I can loan just $25 and change another person's life - what could be better?
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit horse racing association, we support horse owners & trainers in their times of need- The National HBPA.

lender.name: marilyn
lender.loan_because: This seems to be a way that I can make a possitive difference in the world by helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I taught kindergarten for 30 years. I am a mother of three grown children and a grandmother of six. My husband and I just celebrated 48 years of marriage.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: I have AIDS and I want to give back the love and support that has been given to me.
lender.occupational_info: I regulate insurance companies for the State of Washington.

lender.name: Brent Connie
lender.occupation: Contract oilfield worker & they raise sheep.

lender.name: rebecca
lender.loan_because: I heared about this on the Today Show. I knew that I wanted to donate, because I know how it is to live and raise kids as a single mom. There were times I didn't know how I was going to feed my kids. There was always a helping hand somewhere so this is one of my ways of giving back.
lender.occupational_info: I am 52 years young women. I work as a papaeducator with handicap students of high school age. Been doing this for 7 years, working on my AA and then my BA.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the value of hard work and I'm happy to be able to help someone make a better life for themselves and their children.
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: Diem
lender.loan_because: I want to help whenever, I can.

lender.name: Muriel
lender.loan_because: It gives me more than I could ever give away.

lender.name: Lois
lender.loan_because: It's something I can do to help a person in need and actually see the result.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great way to make a difference in peoples' lives. I want to help women all over the world, and this is one way to do that. I'm not religious in any way, just a human helping other humans.
lender.occupational_info: I help people get set up to pay bills online, and to send money over the internet.

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: Initially I chose to focus on people living in the Ukraine because my grandmother, Anna Garbicz, was born there and I've always thought of Ukrainians as family. In truth, we are all ONE people and ONE family.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a educator working for a non-profit to provide free CPR and First Aid classes to members of my community. I'm finishing prerequisites to attend veterinary college next year.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: "to whomever much is given, of him will much be required"
lender.occupational_info: I ensure the quality of my company's computer software and Web sites.

lender.name: Marty and Glade
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Marty sells RV Caravan trips and Glade is an archaeologist. They both farm part time in Colorado.

lender.name: El Brazil
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my children how to be giving and selfless individuals. I also loan because everyone should have the opportunity to fulfill their dreams; money should not be a hinderance.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Social Studies, and English to children in the United States.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I want to watch a business grow and know that I had a part in helping .
lender.occupational_info: I am now writing a book! Love retirement. Retired teacher.

lender.name: Steve
lender.occupational_info: I am a university professor who has been fortunate to visit many of the places affiliated with Kiva. Sharing opportunities with hard-working, energetic people allows me to be a part of the day-to-day life of the places I've been.

lender.name: Ann and friends
lender.loan_because: I love to see people changing their lives for the better and becoming self sufficient. Everyone that wants to have a chance to improve their lives should have the opportunity. God bless these entrepenuers!

lender.name: Magen & Nick
lender.loan_because: We believe that through helping others we can make all our lives better.
lender.occupational_info: Magen works in local government in the building permit department managing the computer systems. Nick is a superintedent in commerical construction.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I believe in equal opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I am an assistant in a large telecommunications company that operates all over the world. 690 cities 60 countries and 6 continents.

lender.name: Tony W
lender.loan_because: Because i feel the need to help the other, beacuse there are many people who have the ideas to keep on forward but whit out money they cant become reality they dreams, having a decent life
lender.occupational_info: Well everybody knows that whit out sacrifice we won obtain what we desire...

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I like the option of loaning money to others who are just wanting some help to be successful in their work and support their family. With some charitable donations you are temporarily rendering aid to a person but they aren't making necessary life changes to move forward in their life and become self supporting. Kiva also provides a great opportunity to help empower woman in other parts of the world that may not necessarily have the opportunity otherwise.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: it's a small thing that I can do. And I get a kick out of how I can be a part of the lives of individuals all over the world.

lender.name: Vee
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving support to hardworking men and women whose life may be improved because of better success with their small business.

lender.name: Gayle
lender.loan_because: My life is filled with blessings everyday. I would like to share those blessings.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired home economics teacher.

lender.name: Morky
lender.loan_because: I'd like to make someone's life a little easier.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: It's a small investment for me, but it will make a big difference in improving someone's life. How could I not do it?
lender.occupational_info: I manage the production details of concerts and other events, primarily for music and arts organizations. I hope that the work I do makes a difference in people's lives.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: This site offers an amazing opportunity to help people across the world invest in themselves and improve their quality of life.

lender.name: Jamie & Tonua
lender.loan_because: I can and it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: It's the economics that really make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school students who need a second chance.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: everyone wants to provide for themselves, some just need a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I teach the subject of agriculture to students from the ages of 13 to 18 years old.

lender.name: Ellen Clark
lender.loan_because: I believe that we who are so lucky must give back to the world. Kiva gives us an easy way to to do that, and it makes me happy to be a part of it.
lender.occupational_info: I used to design computer software, but due to my illness have not worked in a long time.

lender.name: Liana
lender.loan_because: I want to help people's dreams become reality. I think it's amazing that I can make a difference in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am going to school to become a teacher.

lender.name: Judee
lender.loan_because: My life is wonderful and I am grateful and would like to help others
lender.occupational_info: Putting the Customer First

lender.name: Ray & Michelle
lender.loan_because: It's a good thing to do!

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I can, I like to, and it makes sense to me.
lender.occupational_info: I help my state government to protect the health and quality of our state's forests which are owned by the state's citizens.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer my time to support President Obama's agenda.

lender.name: Troy in California
lender.loan_because: I am lucky! Life is short and I believe in investing in worthy people. Many people just do not have the money to build with. I feel good when I can help people improve their quality of life and feed their families.

lender.name: Richard & Carole
lender.loan_because: We think it's a duty to help

lender.name: karen
lender.loan_because: I received loans to go to college and I want to help make a difference in many lives.
lender.occupational_info: medical doctor

lender.name: Familia Graham
lender.loan_because: every journey begins with a single $25 lent in syndicate

lender.name: Fiona
lender.loan_because: I have been extremely fortunate in getting a great education which allowed me to be working in my dream job. I want to help others fullfill their dreams, and I deeply respect how hard people are working to support their families.
lender.occupational_info: I design and develop extremely cool computer software!

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I am so impressed with the people who are starting new businesses and the dignity that this program brings to their efforts

lender.name: kathy
lender.loan_because: There but for the grace of goddess.....

lender.name: KC & Cheryn
lender.loan_because: we want to help others make a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: KC works for the railroad transporting consumer freight and Cheryn works in government in the clerical field.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: what goes around, comes around!
lender.occupational_info: I teach middle school students in grades 6th - 8th (11 - 14 years old).

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: A little of what I have can help others provide for themselves and their community. We live in a global village.
lender.occupational_info: I teach college classes via the internet.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: I love spreading love.
lender.occupational_info: I help families with the decision of organ and tissue donation when they've lost a loved one.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and I want to support other entrepreneurs in their endeavors.

lender.name: Ronni
lender.loan_because: I found this website by coincident. I think its a very good project and therefore I want to support it.
lender.occupational_info: Bachelor in Social Education degree. Working in a kindergarten.

lender.name: Shelley
lender.loan_because: No matter where you are in your life, you deserve to know there are people out there that want to help, believe and be there for each other to bring a little happiness to anothers life....

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate that I now have the funds to allow me to participate in Kiva and help others....and I love what this program can do to improve the life of others

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I believe hard working people should be given the opportunity to succeed.

lender.name: Aaron, Yosmar & Stella
lender.loan_because: The opportunity for our family to grow with the global community, learning from others, and improving our lives.
lender.occupational_info: As parents to Stella our work is to provide her with a safe, nurturing environment. My work in nursing is to deliver high technology medicine with a human touch.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: Because it is important to lend a hand and give support.
lender.occupational_info: I work with my husband in his businesss

lender.name: Olle
lender.loan_because: It's the humane thing to do.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: we should accept help when we need it and give help when we can.

lender.name: "Coop"
lender.loan_because: We can create the world we dream about lending through KIVA.
lender.occupational_info: Assisting my fellow human beings without humbling them or causing them to become dependent. Special emphasis on young families.

lender.name: melody
lender.loan_because: I have three beautiful children who are happy and well fed and who are in school. Every parent should feel as happy as me. I am blessed to have a chance to help another person help themselves and their families!

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I feel very fortunate and this is a great way to help others. It encourages people that work hard and helps them and their families to get ahead.
lender.occupational_info: I sell computers to businesses over the phone. I'm in Sales.

lender.name: jcsaidso
lender.loan_because: Jesus Christ said so
lender.occupational_info: fulfilling

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: gifts tend to be less effective.

lender.name: Marcia
lender.loan_because: because I am so blessed that I could...
lender.occupational_info: I run a small family owned hotel (not my family!)- only 19 rooms- I take reservations, manage costs, schedule housekeeping and maintenance jobs and hours and try to be a good witness for Christ in the process.

lender.name: Henrik
lender.loan_because: I can; and everybody deserves a chance
lender.occupational_info: I manage a practice within a global consulting company

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: Because helping other people become self sufficient by their own work is more useful than giving handouts
lender.occupational_info: I help people account for the money they spend and receive in their business

lender.name: L.J.
lender.loan_because: Someone helped me when I needed it and now it's time to give back.

lender.name: jenn
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Sheilah
lender.loan_because: God blesses me every day, and I want to pass it on to other women.
lender.occupational_info: For many years I worked in an office. Now I "work" by occasionally helping a woman in childbirth. I also volunteer as an animal rescuer.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others to help themselves. I feel fortunate to live where I live and have access to resources.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people. I work as a clinician in my own business. I also work in a clinic that is not for profit. I also work as an educator. I am also involved in a local coffee shop where I put my other business hat on.

lender.name: Melissa and Chris
lender.loan_because: A small amount of money can make a giant difference.

lender.name: Coralie and Denny
lender.loan_because: I believe in the empowerment of owning and growing your own business. I am happy to be able to help other people realize their dreams.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I have been helped by so many people in my life. This is one way to return the help.
lender.occupational_info: I restore older homes and build new homes for people.

lender.name: Outdoor Talk - Members
lender.loan_because: It's important to help other people, and who better to offer help than somoone who is at least putting forth a little extra effort.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of outdoor enthusiasts who enjoy talking over the internet about various topics, usually outdoor sports and activities such as hiking, fishing, and hunting among numerous other outdoor prusuits.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: we can all make a difference.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student and research assistant in an oceanography laboratory in Alaska. I am studying the natural variability of dissolved nutrients in the Gulf of Alaska ecosystem.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: This is one of the best ways I've found to help.. through KIVA.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Roberta
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by the individuals requesting loans and their stories. They show determination, creativity, and initiative in meeting their day to day needs for themselves and their families. How wonderful to be involved in these projrcts!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a Hospice program. We take care of very sick people of all ages who are dying from their illness. We support their families after their death to help them cope with the death and find new meaning in their lives.

lender.name: Darrell
lender.loan_because: I love to see business grow and I think it is awesome to help other people. This seems to be such an incredible cause to help the world economy.
lender.occupational_info: Teacher/coach/real estate investor

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to be a catalyst for change and I believe in helping those who help themselves.

lender.name: Ida
lender.loan_because: I believe that hard-working people need a chance to make money. Kiva gives many entrepreneurs the opportunity to build a business and help create a sustainable economy for their countries. Microloans are an important way to share our good fortune as citizens of the world.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: it's such an easy way to help others realize their dream. There's no reason not to do it!
lender.occupational_info: I help record and organize the financial records of a coffee company.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: to help others reach their goals
lender.occupational_info: stressful and fun, all at the same time.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs that chance to make their life better. I believe all children should have the right to education, they do not choose their own circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I use a computer program to draw maps of oil & gas wellsites and pipelines so they can be constructed from the plans I produce.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I want to help hardworking people around the world.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse, traveling in rural areas to patients' homes to assist them with their medical conditions.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I feel good about doing something to help.
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: we all have the power to make a difference in this world...
lender.occupational_info: I am very popular amongst friends and family. I make French pastries and all different kinds of desserts and sweets and love doing it.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: I feel that everyone deserves to live a good life. Living in the USA I have many opportunities available to me. I want others to be able to have the opportunity to change their life and pursue their dream of running a successful business.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children who are abused or neglected by their parents or guardians. I provide the children and their parents or guardians with referrals to services needed in order for the family to remain together or to be reunited.

lender.name: Beckett Family
lender.loan_because: We want to directly assist people who want to establish and grow their own business.
lender.occupational_info: I manage engineers who design, install, maintain, and repair global data communications networks and mainframe computers.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because:
The entrepreneurs on Kiva can really use any help they can get to start going. They are not begging, but instead try and work hard to build up something good for themselves and others around them. I really admire this.
Kiva is truly a great initiative and I am happy to participate!
lender.occupational_info: I make computer systems work.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: To make the world a better place

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I know that it is difficult to start and run your own business. 9 years ago I started my own business in a male dominated industry and it is successful. I have put in a lot of hard work and dedication and I couldn't have done it without the support of my husband and family. I want to give others an opportunity to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: Home remodeling and decorating.

lender.name: Vickie
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed.
lender.occupational_info: Secretary to people needing government assistance.

lender.name: Tonya
lender.loan_because: "Everyone" is important.
lender.occupational_info: Mother of two. Full time college student. Miltary spouse.

lender.name: Russ Schoen
lender.loan_because: I find it is rewarding to provide resources that may help people improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: helping teams go from "blamestorming to brainstorming". Innovation training and facilitation. Training people to see and create new possibilities. University Instructor at the International Center for Studies in Creativity. www.buffalostate.edu/creativity

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: the Lord has blessed me, and I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the president of an engineering company.

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: i would like to help others get a start so they can live their dream
lender.occupational_info: I am retired and help people in the area that I live. I also volunteer in ministry to tell people about Jesus.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: This is such a great way to lend a hand up to someone in need, and the results they achieve with such modest amounts is truly remarkable.

lender.name: Carl
lender.loan_because: I feel very fortunate to be able to provide for my family and want to help others develop their businesses so that they can provide a better life for their families.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I want to practice generosity
lender.occupational_info: I bring joy, inspiration, courage, spiritual and financial success to thousands and thousands of people

lender.name: Helene
lender.loan_because: I had to start over late in life and it was tough. Now it is possible, in this way, to extend a hand to others who are having a rough go of it -especially where help and resources are limited. I love Kiva - it makes helping out very satisfying.
lender.occupational_info: I have a small music business and also play the cello.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I can. The micro economy is so important in developing countries, especially Central and South America. Buena Suerte con su empresa!
lender.occupational_info: Help educators integrate technology into teaching and learning, as well as other aspects of using technology in education.

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: I support the idea of people pooling their money to help others via small loans as demonstrated by the Credit Unions around the world. This is a very dynamic application of this concept and everyone benefits.
lender.occupational_info: I was a Director of a local Credit Union for over 20 years and I believe in the 'helping hand' approach of making small loans to help others improve their lives.

lender.name: Elise
lender.loan_because: I really want to change people's lives!

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I have been given so much and I would like to give others the opportunity to be self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for hiring the staff that take care of our patients in one the one the best hospitals in the world- UCLA (University of California Los Angeles)

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: Always been aware of the imbalance MY typical American lifestyle causes those less fortunate across the globe, but "Confessions of an Economic Hit Man" really opened my eyes. Kiva allows me some ability to make a small difference.
lender.occupational_info: Among other things I build sets and scenery for theaters, opera, musical, dance and other performing arts events.

lender.name: ML Brittany John
lender.loan_because: Our family helps girls and women around the world start and grow their own businesses so that they can better support and educate their families.
lender.occupational_info:
Mary Lynn helps the leaders of companies run their businesses better.
Brittany is in 9th grade.
John is a banker.

lender.name: zakk, terri, josh, yo
lender.loan_because: we're a family with four different businesses that we are running. we know that helping each other out matters.
lender.occupational_info: terri has a healing art business, josh is a musician, yo and zakk run a computer graphics/tutorial business.

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: I want to help women have their dreams!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a pharmaceutical company that is developing new medicines for specific diseases.

lender.name: Arne Vagn
lender.loan_because: I want to help out

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and teach my daughter the gift of giving.
lender.occupational_info: I am director of a radiology department in a local hospital.

lender.name: Ken, Vicky, Gabby, Emily
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us with abundance so that we may be a blessing to others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in service to my community by caring for the sick, the injured, and the displaced through medical care and preservation of property and assets.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people who are trying to help themselves. Loans give people dignity and teach them responsibility. Go Kiva!

lender.name: Jorge
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people that are prepared to take initiative.

lender.name: Patti
lender.loan_because: As an artist and a small business owner, it feels good to know I can make a difference in the lives of other entrepreneurs working hard to follow their dreams.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I recently visited Nepal and realized more than ever how much our loans can do to help people in need.

lender.name: Humphrey & Mary
lender.loan_because: I have travelled the hard road and life has been good to me. I'm greatful to Kiva for giving me this opportunity to enpower others to attain a better life for themselves and their children

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to help people all over the world achieve their dreams of better lives. I especially like knowing exactly who will benefit from my loans.
lender.occupational_info: I teach young children ages 8 - 11, and in my spare time I make quilts to keep people warm at night. I also volunteer with AFS Intercultrual Programs, bringing teenagers from all over the world to the USA to live with families and go to high school for one year.

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate in my life and want to share with others
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office during the day and recharge my spirit outdoors in the evenings and weekends.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: My mother always taught me that the blessings you give out to others will come back to you. My life is so blessed and I am so grateful to be able to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in my second career (after teaching 30 years) as an attorney specializing in helping disabled people get Social Security disability benefits.

lender.name: Jane & Bob
lender.loan_because: I have had a helping hand in my life and feel it is time to pass it on.
lender.occupational_info: We take care of our grandchildren. Work on our cars and take care of our home.

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I believe anyone willing to work should get a chance to succeed in life.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a mom - that's the same no matter where you are!

lender.name: Cisneros Family
lender.loan_because: It is a simple, yet powerful way in which our family can make a difference :)

lender.name: craig
lender.occupational_info: auto repair

lender.name: Ricardo
lender.loan_because: As an American-Colombian entrepreneur, I identify not only with entrepreneurs around the globe and with the responsibility to help the latino community but also with the idea that a great microlending program is one of the most efficient ways to promote economic development around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I started a tech support company 5 years ago. We support all the computer equipment of 200 businesses in NY.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: We need to make a difference where we can.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I believe that people value what they pay for and small loans given at reasonable rates encourage entrepreneurship and self reliance.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the business affairs of a small non-profit community owned ski area in New Mexico

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I think everyone is entitled to make their own way in the world and sometimes they may need a little help - I and other Kiva lenders are that little help that people need.

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: I can. I just can't think of a reason to not loan. I am lucky that my husband and I can afford a home and have jobs that support us and our daughter. We are both in public service and don't have a large amount of expendable income but we can help and will teach our daughter to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I work in public transportation in Upstate New York.

lender.name: Barb
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of people and with a hand up, people can thrive and care for their family. Thanks, Kiva for making this so easy.

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone provide for them self and their family.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I dont have much, but others have given a helping hand at times when I have truly had need.
lender.occupational_info: Retired police officer, who works with small movies doing police advice, And as an ordained minister do weddings...

lender.name: barbara and ken
lender.loan_because: We love seeing people start their own businesses and become successful.

lender.name: Brent
lender.loan_because: I heard about KIVA on NPR and deeply appreciate its global reach and spirit. It's a true miracle that someone like me can contribute with such ease to the truly needy and wonderful people who receive these loans and touch so many lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a freelancer doing crafts and home design projects for magazines.

lender.name: Amena
lender.loan_because: I want to be part of something that benefits other people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a social worker

lender.name: Shirley & Doug
lender.loan_because: My husband and I are touched daily reading about those around us near and far away that live in difficult times. We wish for peace in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Shirley works as an Office Manager and Doug is a self published writer.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: There was a time many many years ago when I was newly divorced and really struggling financially. Someone anonymously left me several sacks of groceries when I really needed it. There was a note that said someone had helped this person once, and asked that whenever I had opportunity in my life to help others, would I? I help now because though I'm not rich, I have more than my basic needs met, and I want to share where I can so that others can have their needs met.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a successful real estate management company in their Information Technology department.

lender.name: Kristina
lender.loan_because: it makes the world a better place.

lender.name: Deanne
lender.loan_because: I want to be a part of someone's dream
lender.occupational_info: I negotiate and manage business

lender.name: John and Renee
lender.loan_because: Loans to help people help themselves, and teach them about managing money to provide a better life for their families - a simple but so effective solution at such a small cost. It makes sense to us.

lender.name: ralph
lender.loan_because: I believe in encouraging entrepreneurship, and allowing fair opportunities for everyone. Someone helped me get started once, and I want to give that back!
lender.occupational_info: I manufacture and distribute sports wear

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: One day I might need help and its nice to know we still live in a world where people still care about the little guy. We may be the only hope some of these people have and they deserve a chance. It is our duty to give back to the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the county school board, in the district office print shop

lender.name: keith
lender.loan_because: why not
lender.occupational_info: Install telephones and computers.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life and want to help others.

lender.name: Shelley
lender.loan_because: It's the most powerful use of my money I've found.
lender.occupational_info: I assist start-up and existing small businesses in creating and implementing strategy.

lender.name: Pablo
lender.loan_because: My friend Christina drug me into it.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: Restructuring your life for the better is not something unfamiliar to me... it takes strength, dedication & belief in yourself to move forward. I have no hesitation in helping these motivated people start their journeys & see their goals accomplished.
lender.occupational_info: laid off work with few opportunities to use my 20+ yrs of professional experience & skills due to the current U.S. economy

lender.name: Sydney
lender.loan_because: I have been in the position where a small amount of money would have been tremendously helpful to me, and it is good to be able to loan to others now.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional oil painter.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home with my kids and my dogs. I try to create the best environment for their well being.

lender.name: Marcia
lender.loan_because: Because anyone who can, should. Not to mention it feels good. :)
lender.occupational_info: I co-own a business that designs custom web technologies.

lender.name: mary
lender.loan_because: I want to cotinue helping others to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I worked as a nursing sister in a very busy outpatients dept in a glasgow hospital

lender.name: Claudia
lender.loan_because: Feels good to do a good deed. No matter how small.

lender.name: juan carlos
lender.loan_because: Iam a student and i want to open my own company in tourism
lender.occupational_info: I want to work to myself becase i am studing tourism in Cusco Peru and the owner of the companies here pay few for too much work for that i want my own company.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I believe in encouraging hard working individuals to pursue their dreams and to provide for their families. Kiva seems to be a good organization!
lender.occupational_info: I'm semi retired and now able to pursue my dream to be a nature photographer. I work hard to improve my skills and enjoy the process very much. I have some of my work at a local gallery, and show on my website.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I started my business with a very small investment and I want to encourage anyone who has the courage to start his own enterprise.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs for small businesses, many of which are just getting started.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping those who are motivated to help themselves.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I understand how a small amount can make a big difference in people's lives.

lender.name: Vyonne
lender.loan_because: I'd like to believe that I could help someone change their life in a positive way because I have been helped by others before.
lender.occupational_info: I help my patients maintain a healthy mouth by cleaning their teeth and removing germs that could harm all of their body.

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: As a single mom, I understand how hard it is for women in this world to get ahead and make something of their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I rent and sell construction equipment.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: "If a man shuts his ears to the cry of the poor, he too will cry out and not be answered." Prov 21:13. I believe microloans work, and I want to be a part of giving someone a helping hand.

lender.name: The Icelander
lender.loan_because: Those persons having courage to ask for help to make there lives better should be given chance

lender.name: Annabelle and Dave
lender.occupation: we work in the arts and in internet video editing

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: I wish I had my own business, yet it's great to be a tiny part in helping a sister far away succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am unemployed but I wish could do more to help children have a chance in life and succeed.

lender.name: Danna
lender.loan_because: I am first generation "American", so the stuggles of making it in some of these countries is a not too distant part of my heritage.

lender.name: Kaya and Katy
lender.loan_because: We want to help people achieve their dreams and we want to show them that we love them.
lender.occupational_info: Kaya is an attorney; and Katy is in 1st Grade.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do. I do not make a lot of money, BUT I know I will spend $25.00 on extras for myself or my husband. so that $25.00 is going to help others
lender.occupational_info: I am a medical secretary in Labor and Delivery at a local Hospital. I process Birth certificates, do newborn hearing tests.

lender.name: Julian
lender.loan_because: this was my Bar Mitzvah project to help people and pursue justice.

lender.name: The Sullivan Family
lender.loan_because: I think it is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Shelly
lender.loan_because: I loan because I want to make a difference in this world. I was raised in a life where if not for others I would have not succeeded. I remember each one of those people and honor everything they did for me big and small by helping others. I read once and I believe that; Many small people, in many small places, do many small things, that can alter the face of the world. ~Anonymous -
lender.occupational_info: I have always worked in the service of others, in healthcare and in my current job I am a conflict resolver, a peace-maker, helping business, organizations and families resolve disputes.

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Studying to be a lawyer.

lender.name: LCG
lender.loan_because: I believe in people being able to take responsibility for their own life, and have a chance to make their own living.

lender.name: Neal
lender.loan_because: I've been very fortunate. Although I do not have much money by every-day USA standards, my income is quite sufficient for me to live on and enjoy some extra things. I've been sharing much of my life activities with others for many years, and I find that this is a wonderful way to make some of my money do some real good. At my age (77) it's sometimes hard to find activities that one can trust completely. I do trust Kiva, and I hope that Maria soon has enough to fulfill her needs.
lender.occupational_info: I prepare income tax returns. The income tax law in the U.S. is quite complicated and professionals like myself help others to prepare their tax documents so that they are correct and pay only those taxes that they are required to pay. I also assist people in investing their money.

lender.name: Logan & Rachel
lender.loan_because: Being teachers we love giving to others. Giving both the gift of knowledge or others the ability to follow their dream is what we live and breath each day. We just want to help.
lender.occupational_info: We are both public school educators. My wife teaches high school math and I teach elementary art.

lender.name: Felicia
lender.loan_because: $25 makes very little impact on our day to day lives, but if it empowers someone in another part of the world not as privileged as ours, it's the least we can do.
lender.occupational_info: I provide IV therapy to patients in their homes.

lender.name: Zane
lender.loan_because: to perpetuate capitalism for those who are less fortunate

lender.name: Brian, Maritza & kids
lender.loan_because: it makes such great practical sense to assist the entrepreneur in building a means of living that will (+) impact both their family and greater community. A very small price to contribute greatly across the world.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: what a wonderful opportunity to change someone's life for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for the sales and marketing of consumer wireless products in 165 stores.

lender.name: Craig Muller
lender.loan_because: Helping others in this simple and powerful way is right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I teach middle and high school math and science..

lender.name: William Ty
lender.loan_because: I did well in the "womb lottery" and was born in this day and age in the U.S....which, yes means I didn't do so well in many fronts, but I was afforded a certain means to education and to income. I wish to share in my "winnings."
lender.occupational_info: Trabajo en un restarante de pescados y mariscos. El restarante donde trabajo es muy caro. El trabajo que hago es como cantinero, pero yo abro ostiones y conchas para mis clientes. Posiblemente, la cosa que es estrano para gente en otro paises es que los clientes comen los mariscos crudos...de veras! Es muy rico. Trabajo para una duena simpatica, pero no gana mucho de horario, solamente gana la mayoria de mi plata de propinas.

lender.name: James Elmer
lender.loan_because: I am not wealthy but I have been very blessed. Kiva makes it possible for me to share those blessings and make a difference in someone's life where it would otherwise be very difficult for me to do so. My thanks and appreciation to all of you and all you do at Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: For over 33 years I have designed and executed custom embroidery on Theatrical, Circus & Ballet costumes; Rock & Opera stars; draperies, table covers & pillows for Interior Designers; and Collectibles (like my exclusive line of solid sequin Teddy Bears).

lender.name: Jamie Ratliff
lender.loan_because: I believe that people who are trying to start or run a business deserve a chance to be successful. I am honored to be able to help others start or expand their business. Since the US dollar goes a lot further in other parts of the world, it makes it very inexpensive to help others. After all, who cant afford to lend $25 to give someone a chance to make a dramatic change in their life?
lender.occupational_info: I am a freelance writer specializing in small business, internet, and search engine optimization.

lender.name: Nita
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with an amazing loving support system. It is my obligation and joy to pass on support to others
lender.occupational_info: I take photographs and manipulate their texture

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I will help you and you will help someone in need in the future - and so on - as we come to understand that we are ultimately one big community.
lender.occupational_info: I recently retired after working more then 25 years for the protection of the environment.

lender.name: Alan
lender.occupational_info: I work as both a wildlife and nature photographer and a scientist. Some of my photos can be seen at ...

lender.name: Steve and Myra
lender.loan_because: We are so blessed and we would like a chance to share with others.

lender.name: Cece
lender.loan_because: I'm an American....I have so much. Kiva gives me a chance to share, and make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I'm working on being the best person I can be.

lender.name: Maura
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people who are trying so hard to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am involved in two businesses. I am an esthetician and massage therapist with one business and a Strategic Analyst with the other.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to help.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children with mental disabilities.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: This organization is making a difference in supporting entrepreneurs in the developing world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach university courses in psychology, artificial intelligence, marketing, and what it is like to participate in war. I'm very fortunate in that I basically teach what I'm interested in. I also run a publishing business (books of interest for people over age 60).

lender.name: Sungho
lender.loan_because: I would like to do something that I can help people improve their business and life. I also want to be a lender.
lender.occupational_info: The most of my work is to create my software architecture designs and patterns. have a fun and relax ..

lender.name: Todd
lender.occupation: Care Coordinator with Adolescents and their famili

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I am a mother and grandmother. I think women should help other women. I think it is important for us to be aware of what is happening in our world and to try to make a contribution.
lender.occupational_info: I had my own business for 20 years. I retired in July, 2006, and I now try to spend as much time as possible with my husband, grandchildren and children.

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: I care!!!
lender.occupational_info: I own a women's clothing boutique

lender.name: Kodi
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe in Karma ( my Dogma ain't half bad either! ). This enables me to practice small "p" philanthropy. I also want the Kiva person to know that there are people in the World that care.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked in Hospitals providing therapy that a human cannot provide. I have seen incredible results in the people I have worked with. Kiva provides a means for me to help change a person's life from a distance.

lender.name: Shandra
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others to help themselves through running their own business. I also think this type of support is most helpful to women living in poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am a substitute teacher that primarily works with elementary students.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am employed in the IT department of a grocery retail company.

lender.name: Mike & Mary Jo
lender.loan_because: A man filled with the love of God, is not content with blessing his family alone, but ranges through the whole world, anxious to bless the whole human race.
lender.occupational_info: I loan to help facilitate principals of self-reliance; to care for ourselves and our families and to find solutions for our own problems.

lender.name: Federico Sosa Otero
lender.loan_because:
I am a young Paraguayan professional who wants to help other Paraguayans who lack access to credit. I believe micro finance is an essential tool in alleviating poverty because it provides individuals the opportunity to help themselves, through their own effort, rather than through handouts by the state or charity, which are all too common here in Paraguay.
I hope to help through my small contributions and by encouraging other Paraguayans to contribute to Kiva.

lender.name: Christian Finance
lender.loan_because: I care and because that's what Jesus would do.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I'm just trying to help

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I have enough to share with others.

lender.name: Dale and Jill
lender.loan_because: We know that we are blessed beyond what we need and it's a priviledge to serve others.
lender.occupational_info: Coffee Distribution business - profits from this business are invested in microenterprise loans.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: We are all on this planet together and I feel we need to help each other as often as we can.
lender.occupational_info: I mostly make a living as a scenic artist and designer for live theatre.

lender.name: C.J.
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to spare $25 that could help someone else in a great way.
lender.occupational_info: I am in Sales and Management and would love to some day return to the Philippines where I once lived, and make it a better place for those who struggle.

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: Why not?
lender.occupational_info: I help manage online classes

lender.name: Shafeen
lender.loan_because: There are different ways to help people. In some parts of the world basic necessities such as food, water and shelter are required. In other parts of the world, it may be something else. The reason I like the microloan model is because it helps folks become self sustainable. "Give a man a fish, feed him for a day ... teach a man to fish, feed him for a lifetime."

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: It is a way for me to be a part of my global community.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently at the University of Minnesota studying Social Justice and Biology.

lender.name: Gary & Brenda
lender.loan_because: We've been very fortunate and received help from others when we needed it.
lender.occupational_info: He helps build aeroplanes. She sells houses.

lender.name: Tricia
lender.loan_because: With the combined efforts through Kiva we all help make this world a much better place.

lender.name: Daniel Kauffman
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe that microfinancing works wonders to eliminate poverty and help struggling economies. I like to provide the opportunity for those less fortunate to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: 2013 MBA candidate at William and Mary

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an equal chance to succeed in life

lender.name: Cindee
lender.loan_because: I care about mother Gaia and the lives she sustains...

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful opportunity to assist others in the world.
lender.occupational_info: During the day I work for a great company called Proncon MRM Pacific and on the weekends am a civil marriage celebrant in Melbourne who also performs vow renewals, love commitments, house warming, name giving and other ceremonies.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I want my children to grow up in a better world for all of us.
lender.occupational_info: Public Policy Advocate

lender.name: JC Sunglao
lender.loan_because: I was looking for a mini fridge to buy and thought this was a better use of my money.
lender.occupational_info: Student in College

lender.name: Alex
lender.whereabouts: Ho Chi Minh Ho Chi Minh

lender.name: Tomas
lender.loan_because: It feels good to be able to give a helping hand without having a lot of money.

lender.name: SpeedyMax
lender.loan_because: I want to give back something
lender.occupational_info: Information Technology System Engineer

lender.name: Luqman Skye
lender.occupational_info: computational biology

lender.name: CIGALE
lender.loan_because: What a wonderful way to help other women make their dreams come ture!

lender.name: Alexa
lender.loan_because: I believe that people working together around the world can create miracles of which government bureaucracies can only dream.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the tax and finance department of a multinational manufacturing company.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance in life.
lender.occupational_info: Raising students critical awareness of their own subjectivity as well as their relationship to wider society.

lender.name: Camilla
lender.occupational_info: I am studying library and information science in Copenhagen, Denmark

lender.name: Damian
lender.loan_because: There can only be peace when the basic needs are taken care of. Even though I don't have much there is always enough here in the USA where we can afford to share without manipulating goverments. Peace be for all.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently disabled and am getting social security. I am also investigating means of a bussiness which I can earn a living within the parameters of my temporary disabilities. I choose to look at my health situation as tempory for I believe in miracles. I know I am one already. Peace.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should be given a chance to make something out of their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I worked in retail for many years and just recently retired to enjoy life to it's fullest. I have been very lucky in life and it gives me great pleasure to help others.

lender.name: kotinka
lender.loan_because: I've always been lucky enough to have help when I needed it. I hope others can have that too.
lender.occupational_info: bl00dy exhausting! being a mum is the hardest job going & the least recognised. The photo is my youngest son, Michael, covered in muck & wearing his grandad's shoes - so cute!

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the hard work of others in dire need of funds to simply run their business to feed their families
lender.occupational_info: I sell homes

lender.name: Betsey
lender.loan_because: I am truly fortunate in my life, and would like to help others have opportunities and better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Health and Physical Fitness to college students.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to know that I am helping someone in need.
lender.occupational_info: Enjoying life and trying to give a little back =)
